articles.title: 4th DPRK-US Military Working Contact Held
articles.content:
4th DPRK-US Military Working Contact Held
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The fourth round of the DPRK-U.S. senior colonel-level military working contact for the probe into the truth behind the "Cheonan" case was made in Panmunjom Tuesday.
					 At the contact the DPRK side pointed to the unsavory attitude taken by the U.S. forces side during the past three rounds of the bilateral working contacts.
					
					 It urged the U.S. forces side to affirmatively respond to the DPRK's proposal for field investigation by the inspection group of its National Defence Commission for making an objective and scientific probe into the truth about the "Cheonan" case, away from its double-dealing attitude manifested in the course of the contacts made so far. The U.S. forces side, however, threw hurdles in the way of discussion, insisting on its proposal for "joint assessment group" the injustice of which had already been brought to light. 
					
					 Stating that it is the unshakable will of the army and people of the DPRK to dispatch an inspection group of the NDC for the purpose of probing the truth behind the warship case to the last, the DPRK side advanced the following proposal reflecting the assertions of both sides:
					
					 The KPA-U.S. joint inspection group shall be formed to involve the KPA side and the U.S. forces side for an early opening of the DPRK-U.S. general-level military talks.
					
					 High-ranking general-level officers shall be appointed by the KPA side and the U.S. forces side respectively to head the group.
					
					 The joint inspection group shall be made up of the members of the NDC inspection group from the KPA side and members of the U.S. forces side, 20 to 30 men from each side.
					
					 The group may work for 3-5 days or the period of its inspection may be extended when necessary. Investigation shall be confined to the scene of the incident, salvaged warship, witnesses, material evidence and relevant objects.
					
					 All possible methods including field investigation, analysis of material evidence, hearing from witnesses and analysis of data shall be employed to the maximum.
					
					 The U.S. forces side shall provide conveniences such as the provision of all the data requested by the KPA side and guarantee of the overland passage and personal security of its members.
					
					 This proposal is a fair and aboveboard and landmark one understandable and acceptable to everyone in the light of its legal validity and realistic propriety, the KPA side said, stressing that whether the U.S. forces side accepts the above-said proposal or not will confirm its final stand on the clarification of the case.  
					
					 Both sides agreed to make the fifth round of the contact in Panmunjom, depending on their programs.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Chadian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Chadian President
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Idriss Deby, president of Chad, on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger on a higher stage and sincerely wished the president, government and people of Chad greater success in their efforts to consolidate the independence of the country and achieve national reconciliation and economic development.

articles.title: European Society for Study of Juche Councilor Here
articles.content:
European Society for Study of Juche Councilor Here
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Lyne Sinyodyium, councilor of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, arrived here Tuesday by air.

articles.title: Builders of Taegyedo Tideland Commended
articles.content:
Builders of Taegyedo Tideland Commended
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Official commendations were bestowed on officials and builders who performed labor feats in completing the Taegyedo tideland reclamation project.
					 A ceremony of bestowing commendations took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Order of Kim Il Sung went to the North Phyongan Provincial Tideland Reclamation Complex and Kim Il Sung Prize to the design of the tideland reclamation at the ceremony.
					
					The title of Labor Hero together with Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag 1st Class were awarded to 16 people and the commendation of watch bearing the august name of President Kim Il Sung were conferred on 34 people and the citation of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, on 42 and Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize on 4.
					
					 Honorary titles, Order of National Flag 1st Class, Order of Labor, Order of National Flag 2nd Class, Order of National Flag 3rd Class and Medal of Merit went to many officials and builders.

articles.title: Red Cross Relief Activities in DPRK
articles.content:
Red Cross Relief Activities in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Red Cross activities have been conducted in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to heal the flood damage and stabilize the life of the people in the affected areas.
					 The DPRK Red Cross Society, in collaboration with the members of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies working in the country, has sent relief goods to the flood-stricken areas.
					
					 Red Cross branch offices in such areas as Anju City and Nyongwon and Taehung Counties of South Phyongan Province and Sinhung, Yonggwang and Pukchong Counties of South Hamgyong Province have made a detailed survey of the flood damage, while stabilizing people's livelihood.
					
					 Participating in the relief activities are more than 4,500 Red Cross members and volunteers. They have set up first-aid treatment stations in many places to give medical services to those suffering from injuries and contaminated water.
					
					 Branch offices have also provided residents with information necessary for preventing accidents and diseases in anticipation of another torrential rain.

articles.title: Indoor Pool Built for Diplomatic Envoys
articles.content:
Indoor Pool Built for Diplomatic Envoys
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- A modern indoor swimming pool was built at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club in Pyongyang for the better cultural and emotional life of the members of the corps.
					 Covering an area of thousands of square meters it has a swimming pool, a wading pool and a paddling pool for children and is fully equipped with such welfare service amenities as sauna, room for rest, medical physical training room and hairdressing and beauty parlors, shop and restaurant. 
					
					 An opening ceremony was held on Tuesday.

articles.title: Panwoldo Pool Overcrowded with People
articles.content:
Panwoldo Pool Overcrowded with People
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Panwoldo Swimming Pool in the picturesque Rungnado Recreation Ground in Pyongyang is jammed with people every day. 
					 Rim Su Chang, head of the management office of the recreation ground, told KCNA that the swimming pool was crowded to capacity with several thousand people coming every day in this hot season.
					
					 The swimming pool, composed of four open-air baths, is frequented mainly by youth and schoolchildren.
					
					 Also seen there are some aged men and women.
					
					It offers a glimpse of the cultural and emotional activities enjoyed by the Korean people under the care of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The swimming pool covering thousands of square meters and its auxiliary facilities have recently undergone facelifting to provide better conditions to those enjoying themselves there.

articles.title: Okryu Restaurant, Pride of Pyongyang
articles.content:
Okryu Restaurant, Pride of Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Okryu Restaurant, the pride of Pyongyang, will shortly mark the 50th anniversary of its foundation.
					 The restaurant has earned fame as the grand public service center strong in national flavor since it sprang up on the bank of the picturesque River Taedong on August 13, Juche 49 (1960) covered with Korean-style crane-shaped roof.
					
					 A total of more than 68.8 million people from all walks of life across the country came to it and relished Pyongyang cold noodle, the nation's specialty, and sturgeon and terrapin dishes and other rare famous dishes during the past five decades, enjoying the benefits under socialism. 
					
					 The restaurant turned into the best public catering service center as its buildings are made formative and artistic and its service facilities are put on a peculiarly modern basis and it is equipped with best conditions for convenience.  Its daily accommodation increased twenty times as compared with that soon after its foundation.  
					
					 The restaurant is becoming all the more popular for the peculiar flavor of national dishes getting stronger along with its magnificent appearance.
					
					 Tray-noodle with minced meat made new appearance as a peculiar national dish as good as Obuk (flesh of the cow belly) tray-noodle which was served only at the royal palace in the olden days and it is very popular.
					
					 The restaurant served 500 trays of noodle a day just after its inauguration but now the number reached more than 10,000 as it is deluged with an increasing number of people everyday for its matchless delicacies. 
					
					 Thousands of Korean dishes are cooked at the restaurant as a result of which it became popular as the best national dishes restaurant. All sorts of dainties served at this restaurant are adding to the pleasure of the people together with Pyongyang cold noodle.
					
					 There appeared rooms specially serving quail dishes at the restaurant in September last year to be followed by sturgeon aquariums and terrapin feeding ground. People are served with 40 kinds of sturgeon and salmon dishes and varieties of other rare dishes.
					
					 From February this year specially-prepared terrapin dishes efficacious for health and longevity are served with mild liquors of famous brand produced at the Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory, conspicuously adding to the flavor.
					
					 The speciality foods annexe of Okryu Restaurant is taking shape with each passing day on the bank of the River Taedong.
					
					 Its completion will make it possible for Okryu Restaurant to serve all sorts of delicacies including traditional national dishes, famous dishes and all kinds of drinks.

articles.title: Liberation Won with Strength of Korean People
articles.content:
Liberation Won with Strength of Korean People
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung defeated the Japanese imperialists by guiding the final offensive for national liberation to victory.
					 With the lapse of days in 1945, the defeat of the Japanese imperialists was getting nearer.
					
					 At that time the President was busy with preparations for defeating the Japanese imperialists by dint of the Korean people's strength and achieving national liberation. 
					
					 In line with his strategic plan, the units of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) were reorganized to carry out the final offensive operation.
					
					 Besides, many armed organizations were newly formed and full preparations made to arouse all people in the operation together with the KPRA units. 
					
					 On the night of August 8, the President ordered small units to surprise some points of military importance in border areas, throwing the enemy into confusion.  
					
					 It was his intention for making a breakthrough in the anti-Japanese operation to compel the enemy to reveal the defence system, manpower and firearms reinforced by them covertly by attacking the points of military importance. 
					
					 On August 9 the President issued an order of an all-out offensive to the KPRA units for the liberation of the country.
					
					 Some KPRA units advanced toward Kilju, Pukchong, Sinhung and Kanggye from the secret camp in Mt. Kanbaek and some other units broke through the enemy's frontier bastions along the Tuman River while furthering the achievement in the war. 
					
					 Civilian armed organizations joined KPRA units in their advance, mopping up remnants of the enemy and attacking the enemy's posts in different parts of the country.
					
					 The attackers annihilated the resisting Japanese troops and disarmed them of their weapons.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists could not but announce an unconditional surrender on August 15, a week after the start of the all-out offensive.

articles.title: Scheme for New Cold War Blasted
articles.content:
Scheme for New Cold War Blasted
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. warmongers and the south Korean puppet forces are contemplating staging Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises in mid-August. This is a dangerous act of trying to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 The joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique one after another are military rackets aimed at mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK from A to Z in light of their scale and period, war equipment, form and contents, the article points out, and goes on to say:
					
					 Their contents are bringing into bolder relief their aggressive nature.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet clique oriented the whole course of the joint naval exercises toward the purpose of mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 Fighter planes involved in the exercises staged drills for making surprise attack and precision strike on the objects simulated to be nuclear facilities and missile, submarine and air force bases of the DPRK, and tanker planes refueled those fighter planes in the air for the purpose of increasing their bomb loading capacity and flying time. Meanwhile, the U.S. Cyber command conducted Network training to paralyze the commanding system of the DPRK. All these facts clearly indicate what the enemies sought in the said plays with fire.
					
					 The joint military exercises, staged by the south Korean puppet forces in West Sea of Korea in August at the instigation the U.S. imperialists, are of more provocative nature.
					
					 No one can vouch that such war gambles will not turn into a real war.
					
					 It is the invariable policy and wicked design of the U.S. to invade the DPRK with south Korea as its military and strategic stronghold and realize its reactionary Asia strategy and strategy for world supremacy.
					
					 But the U.S. anachronistic new Cold War policy is bound to go bankrupt.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to abandon its foolish delusion to attain the aims for stifling the DPRK and dominating Asia by force of arms.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Exercises Unjustifiable
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Exercises Unjustifiable
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean bellicose forces conducted the largest-ever joint naval exercises against the DPRK in the East Sea of Korea together with the U.S. under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case. Following this the puppet forces waged frantic anti-submarine exercises in the West Sea of Korea, increasing the danger of the outbreak of a war of aggression against the DPRK to an extreme phase on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 In order to hide the gravity of the military provocations and mislead the public opinion the south Korean bellicose forces described the exercises as "defensive ones" for increased "capability to counter asymmetrical provocation" by someone, the article says, asserting that the anti-DPRK war exercises can never be justified under any circumstances.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities conducted the largest-ever joint naval war exercises targeted against the DPRK as part of the "military countermeasures" in the wake of the "Cheonan" case. This is an undisguised military threat to the DPRK and provocation against it
					
					 The situation clearly shows that the war exercises staged by the puppet forces in the West Sea of Korea were not "defensive exercises" but the deliberate military provocation to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The most urgent issue on the Korean Peninsula, where a touch-and-go situation prevails, is to create a peaceful atmosphere.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula has been in the state of neither war nor peace for more than half a century.
					
					 All the anti-DPRK war exercises conducted in south Korea constituted a factor that aggravated the confrontation and tension between the north and the south and hindered the national reunification.
					
					 It is well-known that whenever the Korean nation's desire for reunification ran high, the warmongers inside and outside conducted madcap large-scale war exercises, rendering the situation tense and disturbing the efforts for the solution of the reunification issue.
					
					 Now that the puppet bellicose forces conduct the war gambling one after another after making the provocation of an anti-DPRK war an established fact, the DPRK will clearly show to those buoyed by war fever what a real war is like any time it deems necessary through a war of retaliation of its own style based on its nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: KCNA on Japan's Moves for Overseas Aggression
articles.content:
KCNA on Japan's Moves for Overseas Aggression
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Japan is set to carry out its operation for overseas aggression in real earnest.
					 Officers of Japan's Maritime "Self-Defence Force" participated on the pretext of "observer" in the largest-ever U.S.-south Korea joint naval exercises staged in the East Sea of Korea in July. 
					
					 Japan awkwardly defended this fact, stating that the officers did not directly take part in the exercises but watched their process only on the U.S. navy's carrier "George Washington".  
					
					 Such justification was prompted by Japan's proper shrewd calculation to calm down international criticism to be caused by the violation of the constitution which bans exercise of the "right of collective self-defense". 
					
					 As been known to everyone, the said joint naval exercises were an adventurous and reckless saber-rattling for improving the tactics of war against the DPRK under the signboard of "defence" and "deterrence". Involved in the rehearsal were huge naval and air forces including the surface and underwater nuclear strike means made up of the U.S. nuclear aircraft carrier and submarines and several hundred fighter planes. 
					
					 It was very childish to make such justification that the MSDF got on the nuclear aircraft carrier merely to play "observers".
					
					 Public opinions have expressed their concern at the participation of MSDF's officers in the exercises "as observers", contending that it is a serious matter in relation to the future role of Japan's "Self-Defence Forces". 
					
					 Japan's Tokyo Shimbun said it is very exceptional that the SDF participated in the military exercises aimed at a specified country though as an "observer". 
					
					 What can not be overlooked is the fact that the chief Cabinet secretary of Japan made remarks intended to grab Tok Islets again to coincide with the said participation. 
					
					 In this regard, a spokesman for south Korea's Democratic Labor Party denounced the SDF's participation in the exercises as Japan's scheme to advance into the East Sea of Korea in a bid to grab the islets. 
					
					 These facts fully reveal Japan's wild ambition for reinvasion that has reached a dangerous stage. 
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries seek to make a breakthrough for their ambition for overseas expansion by toeing the U.S. strategy of aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 They sent the MSDF officers to the U.S.-south Korea joint naval exercises under the signboard of "observer" and "inspection" this time. With it as a precedent, they are attempting to openly hurl the SDF troops into the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises in the future. 
					
					 Japan's participation in the U.S.-led madcap military maneuvers, conducted with the case of warship sinking in south Korea as an occasion, was evidently motivated by its ulterior scheme to stage a comeback to Korea. 
					
					 If Japan seeks to realize its wild ambition for reinvasion of Korea, oblivious of the lesson of history, it will meet irrevocably destructive consequences.

articles.title: S. Korea Denounced for Suppression of Reunification
articles.content:
S. Korea Denounced for Suppression of Reunification
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Pro-Reunification Youth, an association supporting the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification, made public a statement denouncing the puppet authorities' suppression of the reunification movement on August 6.
					The statement accused the "Security Investigation Group" under the Seoul District Police Agency of searching the house of Kim Yong Ho, chief of the Pro-Reunification Youth, and investigating Yun Ki Jin, former chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification who is put behind bars.
					
					The police took such outrageous actions under the ridiculous pretence that he sent problematic letters to reunification movement organizations from behind bars, the statement charged, and went on:
					
					The letters carried assertion calling for achieving peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula by implementing the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark of national reunification.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak regime, taking issue with it, took such repressive action again, clear evidence proving that the authorities have gone desperate in their moves to strangle him even in the prison, not content with the violation of his thinking and freedom.
					
					The authorities forsaken by the people are now turning violent, only bringing earlier the day when they will face punishment, the statement noted. It urged the Lee Myung Bak regime engrossed in anti-reunification acts of treachery to step down of its own accord.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of Reunification Supported
Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of Mexico made public a joint statement and personages of Equatorial Guinea and Finland statements to mark the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's celebrated work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification."
					Mexican political parties and organizations, including the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party, the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification and the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association, in the Aug. 1 joint statement said that the three charters for national reunification formulated by Kim Jong Il are a basic cornerstone of the movement for Korea's reunification and an immortal great reunification programme which comprehended the idea of "By our nation itself" and the idea of independent reunification. 
					
					The joint statement contended that Korea's independent reunification should be realized without fail under the banner of the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration in line with the three charters for national reunification. 
					
					Antti Sika Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, in a statement on Aug. 8 called upon the progressive personages and peace-loving people of Finland to fully support the three charters set forth by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Juan Nko Mbula, deputy general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, in a statement on Aug. 2 expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people's struggle, hoping that they would achieve the peaceful reunification of Korea at an early date.

articles.title: US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Censured
articles.content:
US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Censured
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany carried in the August issue of its organ "Rote Fahne" a statement condemning the U.S. evermore undisguised moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					 Bitterly denouncing the U.S. aggression maneuvers and sanctions against the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 Now that the "Cheonan" warship case has not yet been clearly probed, the U.S. call for "sanctions" against the DPRK is an infringement upon the rights of a sovereign state, and moreover the war maneuvers staged by the U.S. imperialists together with the south Korean puppet clique are a grave provocation to the DPRK.  
					
					 We are sure that the brave Korean people will win in the staunch fight against the aggression moves of the U.S. and its followers. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany expresses solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to develop the economy and improve the standard of people's living under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Story of Kim Il Sun
articles.content:
Story of Kim Il Sun
 Pyongyang, August 10 (KCNA) -- One day in July Juche 36 (1947) President Kim Il Sung gave field guidance to a newly-built rest home.
					 After the opening ceremony and reception for vacationers, the President suggested having a photo session with them.
					
					 They, in an ecstasy of joy, pushed each other trying to get nearer to him.
					
					 Only women who had remained fettered by feudalism hesitated to find their places to stand.
					
					 Looking at the women with tearful faces, the President told them to come near to him.
					
					 Then the women, with a broad smile on their faces, rushed toward him.
					
					 Therefore they had a good chance to have a picture taken beside the President.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Phanmunjom cuarta ronda del contacto RPDC-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Phanmunjom cuarta ronda del contacto RPDC-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en Phanmunjom la cuarta ronda del contacto de trabajo militar a nivel de primer coronel entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y los Estados Unidos para aclarar los verdaderos aspectos del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan".
					  En la ocasion, la parte coreana se refirio a la mala conducta de la parte de tropas norteamericanas en los tres contactos anteriores
					
					  La parte norteamericana debe separarse de su actitud dual mostrada durante los contactos realizados hasta la fecha y responder con actitud positiva a la propuesta de la investigacion en el  terreno por el grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC con miras a esclarecer de modo objetivo y cientifico el incidente de "Cheonan", exigio la parte coreana.
					
					  Pero, la parte norteamericana obstaculizo el debate del problema insistiendo en su propuesta del "grupo de evaluacion conjunta" cuya injusticia fue revelada ya.
					
					  La parte coreana ratifico que el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC tienen la inconmovible voluntad de aclarar hasta el final los verdaderos aspectos del caso enviando el grupo de inspeccion del CDN y presento la siguiente propuesta nueva que comprende las opiniones de ambas partes:
					
					  Componer y poner en operacion el "grupo de inspeccion conjunta RPDC-EE.UU. en que participaran la parte del Ejercito Popular de Corea y la de las tropas norteamericanas para la inauguracion primitiva de las conversaciones militares a nivel de general RPDC-EE.UU.
					
					  El jefe del "grupo de inspeccion conjunta RPDC-EE.UU denomina respectivo general de alto nivel en la parte del EPC y la de las tropas norteamericanas.
					
					    El grupo de inspeccion conjunta RPDC-EE.UU. tiene que componerse respectivamente con 20-30 miembros en la parte del EPC, que incluye a los miembros del grupo de inspeccion del CDN, y en la parte de tropas norteamericanas.
					
					  El periodo de investigacion puede ser de 3 a 5 dias o mas largo en casos necesarios y los objetos a ser inspeccionados seran el lugar donde fue hundida la corbeta "Cheonan", este buque sacado a flote, los testigos, pruebas materiales y objetos correspondientes.
					
					  La inspeccion conjunta se realizara usando todos los metodos posibles, entre otros, el recorrido al lugar de los hechos, el analisis de las pruebas materiales, la audicion de declaraciones de testigos, el analisis de datos, etc.
					
					? La parte norteamericana debe ofrecer todos los datos que demande la parte del EPC y garantizar todas las comodidades como el transito terrestre y la seguridad personal.
					
					  Tanto en sentido juridico como en vista de la razon, esta propuesta es imparcial, justa y trascendental que todos pueden comprender y consentir, insistio la parte coreana y asevero que aceptarla o no confirmara la posicion definitiva de la parte de las tropas norteamericanas con respecto a la aclaracion del caso de la corbeta "Cheonan".
					
					  Ambas partes acordaron sostener a finales de agosto en Phanmunjom la quinta ronda del contacto.

articles.title: Se dinamiza en Corea la operacion de la cruz roja
articles.content:
Se dinamiza en Corea la operacion de la cruz roja
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- En Corea se realiza activamente el trabajo socorrista de la cruz roja para reparar las consecuencias de inundacion causada por el aguacero y estabilizar la vida de los habitantes de zonas damnificadas.
					En cooperacion con los miembros de la delegacion de la Federacion Internacional de Sociedades de la Cruz Roja y la Medialuna Roja que trabaja en Corea, la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea organiza bien el transporte y la distribucion de los materiales de socorro para que estos lleguen a tiempo a los damnificados.
					
					Las sucursales de la asociacion en las zonas afectadas como la ciudad de Anju y los distritos de Nyongwon y Taehung de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur y los distritos de Sinhung, Yonggwang y Pukchong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur investigan en detalles la magnitud de danos y estabilizan la vida de los habitantes locales.
					
					Mas de 4 mil 500 miembros de la asociacion y voluntarios, quienes asisten al socorro, instalaron los puestos de primeros auxilios en varios lugares y ofrecen ya los servicios medicos a los que sufren por las lesiones, la contaminacion del agua, etc.
					
					Ya que se preve un tremendo aguacero en el futuro, las sucursales intensifican la propaganda para prevenir los posibles accidentes y enfermedades.

articles.title: No se puede justificar por nada ejercicios de guerra contra RPDC
articles.content:
No se puede justificar por nada ejercicios de guerra contra RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- Tras desarrollar con Estados Unidos en el Mar Este de Corea el ejercicio maritimo conjunto anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de maxima envergadura en la historia so pretexto del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", los belicistas surcoreanos desplegaron frenetica e independientemente el ejercicio antisubmarinos en el Mar Oeste de Corea.
					Debido a estas maniobras, se agravo al maximo en la Peninsula Coreana el peligro de estallido de la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este martes.
					
					El articulista afirma que no se puede justificar en ningun caso esos entrenamientos contradiciendo a las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas, que para ocultar la gravedad de su provocacion militar y enganar a la opinion publica, los describieron como "defensivos" para fortalecer la "capacidad de enfrentarse" a la "provocacion asimetrica" de alguien.
					
					Recalca que las autoridades surcoreanas los libraron como parte de las "contramedidas militares" frente al caso de "Cheonan" y esto constituye una amenaza abierta y provocacion militar a la RPDC, y continua:
					
					La situacion demuestra claramente que el ejercicio de guerra desarrollado en el Mar Oeste de Corea no fue para la "defensa" sino un acto de invasion armada encaminado a desatar la guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					El problema mas apremiante de la Peninsula Coreana, que corre el riesgo de guerra a punto de explosion, es preparar el ambiente pacifico.
					
					Durante mas de medio siglo, la Peninsula Coreana no esta en guerra ni en paz.
					
					Todos los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC efectuados en el territorio surcoreano constituyeron historicamente el factor que agravo la confrontacion y la tension entre ambas partes coreanas e impidio la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Ya es conocido por todo el mundo que cada vez que crecia la aspiracion a la reunificacion de la nacion coreana, los belicistas internos y externos libraron malintencionadamente algun ejercicio de guerra para agravar la situacion y estropear la solucion del problema de reunificacion.
					
					Ya que los belicistas titeres surcoreanos despliegan sucesivamente los ejercicios de la guerra contra la RPDC considerandola como un hecho consumado, esta les hara probar lo que es una guerra de verdad al lanzar en cualquier momento necesario la guerra sagrada de represalia a su estilo, basada en el disuasivo nuclear.

articles.title: ATCC comenta la presencia militar de Japon en ultramar
articles.content:
ATCC comenta la presencia militar de Japon en ultramar
Pyongyang, 10 de agosto (ATCC) -- Entraron en etapa crucial los movimientos de Japon para cumplir la operacion de agresion a ultramar.
					Unos oficiales de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" de Japon tomaron parte bajo el pretexto de "visita" en el macroejercicio maritimo conjunto Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea, desarrollado en julio pasado en el Mar Este de Corea.
					
					Al respecto, Japon esta diciendo que esos oficiales de las "Fuerzas Navales de Autodefensa" no participaron directamente en el ejercicio sino lo observaron a bordo del portaaviones "George Washington" de las fuerzas navales norteamericanas.
					
					Esta excusa parte de la picardia propia de Japon que piensa evitar con ella el escandalo internacional que posiblemente se desataria por esa presencia de oficiales japoneses que esta prohibida por la constitucion siendo el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva".
					
					Como saben todos, el reciente ejercicio conjunto maritimo, en que fueron movilizados los medios de ataque nuclear compuestos de portaaviones y submarinos y las colosales fuerzas navales y aereas inclusive cientos de cazas, fue la aventura militar para practicar los metodos de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea bajo el rotulo de "defensa" y "restriccion".
					
					La opinion publica expresa su profunda preocupacion senalando que la presencia del "grupo de visita" de las "Fuerzas Navales de Autodefensa" en ese ejercicio llama la atencion en lo relativo al papel futuro de estas fuerzas.
					
					"Tokio Shimbun" transmitio que aunque se dice que son "observadores", es muy excepcional que los oficiales de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" hayan participado en el ejercicio militar contra un pais.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que coincidiendo con ese suceso, el director del secretariado del gabinete de Japon abogo otra vez por usurpar el islote Tok.
					
					El portavoz del Partido de Obreros Democraticos del Sur de Corea revelo que Japon, que pretende arrebatar el islote Tok, mando a sus oficiales al ejercicio maritimo EE.UU.-Sur de Corea para abrir su ruta de avance en el Mar Este de Corea.
					
					Los hechos demuestran directamente la siniestra ambicion de Japon de iniciar la reagresion y expandirse a ultramar sumandose a la agresiva estrategia a Corea de EE.UU.
					
					Esta vez, Japon mando sus oficiales en calidad de "observador" y "visitante" al ejercicio conjunto EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, librado en el Mar Este de Corea bajo el pretexto del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan". Pero, tomandolo como precedente, quiere despachar en el futuro sus "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" a los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea como participantes efectivos.
					
					Si Japon trata de realizar a toda costa su ambicion de reagredir a la RPDC olvidando la leccion de la historia, sufrira las consecuencias irreparablemente catastroficas.
